title: Cian Uijtdebroeks Saga over as Bora-Hansgrohe Releases Belgian from Contract
content:
The 20-year-old will now be free to ride with Visma-Lease a Bike in 2024 after already signing a four-year deal with the Dutch squad.

Read the full article at Cian Uijtdebroeks Saga over as Bora-Hansgrohe Releases Belgian from Contract on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
